TopicTitle: [1.4.x-1.8.x] Airplane Plus - R26.4 (Fixed issues/Github is up to date) (Dec 21, 2019)

Articles.Content: When i use the size 2 parts i have an unplayable amount of lag. My fps drops to less than 1 and i have a 5900x so there  is no reason i shoupd have the performance issue's. Whats going on?

3 hours ago, YaBoyShredderson said:

When i use the size 2 parts i have an unplayable amount of lag. My fps drops to less than 1 and i have a 5900x so there  is no reason i shoupd have the performance issue's. Whats going on?

You need to provide a log file.  Most likely something is getting nullrefs
will Airplane get new update that adds new parts Soon? i would like to see some parts for 747, WB-57F, and super guppy
Has anyone tested this mod for 1.12 compatibility?

27 minutes ago, The Dressian Exploder said:

compatibility

It works as it worked before, but landing gears could be updated in a simple way to get new physics fixes. Something like that(it applies to all legs and gears and your warranty is void when using it lol). Same with all other parts packs with legs or wheels, nothing is broken, but you can add these parameters to make it better. 

//forcing all gears and legs to use new physics in a dirty way

@PART[*]:HAS[@MODULE[ModuleWheelBase]]
{
    @MODULE[ModuleWheelBase]
    {
        %useNewFrictionModel = true
    }
}

@PART[*]:HAS[@MODULE[ModuleWheelSuspension]]
{
    @MODULE[ModuleWheelSuspension]
    {
        %useDistributedMass = true
    }
}

//for steerable wheels, can't do it automatically yet
//    @PART[*]:HAS[@MODULE[ModuleWheelSteering]]
//    {
//        @MODULE[ModuleWheelSteering]
//        {
//            %idkwhichparameter = true
//        }
//    }

 

Edited June 27, 2021 by Hohmannson

On 6/27/2021 at 10:12 AM, The Dressian Exploder said:

Has anyone tested this mod for 1.12 compatibility?

I haven't unlocked the last few parts of the tech tree yet (haven't gotten to play it much just yet and not using cheats), but so far Airplane Plus hasn't been working for me on both 1.12 and 1.12.1. I have no idea if any of the many other mods I'm running are responsible for interfering in some way (obviously, this early after the update and patch, most haven't been updated for 1.12.x yet – I'm updating them as they are, even on days I dont get to play). None of the parts are showing up in the editor. I'm not sure why that is, and I haven't gotten an "incompatible mod detected" message when loading. 

If anyone can help me figure that out, I'd be happy to provide my logs and mod list. That would be really awesome... as this mod is crucial to most gameplay... outside of the same old space missions.

Well that's good to know, thanks.

Any idea why it isn't working for me? Here's my mod list:

I'm not sure if you'd need my logs or not, so lmk. I'm not an expert at this stuff. Apologies if this isn't how to go about this... any help is good help. Thanks!

12 minutes ago, Cochise said:

I'm not sure if you'd need my logs

I would need to see your ksp.log and your player.log Details of  gathering the information are in a link in my signature re: "How to get support"

4 hours ago, Caerfinon said:

I would need to see your ksp.log and your player.log Details of  gathering the information are in a link in my signature re: "How to get support"

KSP: 1.12.1 Mac 64-bit

Problem: Airplane plus, SXT, several other mods parts are not showing up in SPH or VAB

Player.log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/3s78fjp6xbdgmb7/Player.log?dl=0

Any insight you could provide would be greatly appreciated. Thanks

45 minutes ago, Cochise said:

KSP.log:

The parts are mot loading correctly.

Lots of errors for parts that look very much like this; 

[LOG 15:59:57.475] PartLoader: Compiling Part 'AirplanePlus /Parts/Aero/flaps/kruegerflap/kruegerflap'
[ERR 15:59:57.477] PartCompiler: Cannot clone model 'AirplanePlus/Parts/Aero/flaps/modelkrueger' as model does not exist
[ERR 15:59:57.477] PartCompiler: Model was not compiled correctly
[ERR 15:59:57.477] PartCompiler: Cannot compile model
[ERR 15:59:57.477] PartCompiler: Cannot compile part

It's occurring to quite a number of your parts mods. Is it possible there are some missing files? Of that they are corrupted somehow?

Also your game is throwing lots of exception for objects not found. Likely related to missing parts.

You may need to reinstall.

Sheesh. No idea what that’s about. All of the part files are in there. I’ll see what I can figure out and reinstall what I can. Thanks again.
I hope this gets an update soon

On 7/10/2021 at 6:04 PM, Brainpop14 said:

I hope this gets an update soon

With the exception of some of the wheels parts, the other Airplane Plus parts are working quite nicely in KSP 1.12.1

Edited July 12, 2021 by Caerfinon

On 7/10/2021 at 7:05 PM, Caerfinon said:

With the exception of some of the wheels parts, the other Airplane Plus parts are working quite nicely in KSP 1.12.1

Oh, good. I was just about to ask.

Thank you.

 

Edited July 16, 2021 by Ben J. Kerman
Out of reactions today.

But it would still be nice to see a "Finalized" version with the wheels modified to the new 1.12 standard/system.  Plus, making the thread title have a 1.12.X in it might bring more attention to the mod.

1 hour ago, GKSP said:

But it would still be nice to see a "Finalized" version

No one would like to see an update more than me, but mod development is typically a side gig for most people. The needs of real life and other interests often introduce periods where the mod just goes untouched for awhile, until the original creator returns or an enterprising newcomer forks it into something new and resurrects it.

Did they really make an updated wheel module on 1.12... not like this... I don't have the files anymore. But I want to update it and I'm quite busy. Don't hold your breath on it but, I will do my best to make time and take a look. I don't know yet how I will modify or understand the wheels but I'll check the game files when I get the time. Again - don't hold your breath on it but I've been on bad terms with the old model they have and this has been a long time coming.

15 minutes ago, blackheart612 said:

I'll check the game files when I get the time

That's all we can ask. Just so you know all the other parts still work very well. It is a very useful mod.

5 hours ago, blackheart612 said:

Did they really make an updated wheel module on 1.12... not like this... I don't have the files anymore. But I want to update it and I'm quite busy. Don't hold your breath on it but, I will do my best to make time and take a look. I don't know yet how I will modify or understand the wheels but I'll check the game files when I get the time. Again - don't hold your breath on it but I've been on bad terms with the old model they have and this has been a long time coming.

Got you covered: 

@PART[biplanegear,blackhawkgear,herculesgear]
{
	@MODULE[ModuleWheelBase]
	{
		useNewFrictionModel = true
	}
	@MODULE[ModuleWheelSuspension]
	{
		useDistributedMass = true
	}
}
@PART[miggear,airbusreargear,b29gear,fightergear,herculesfrontgear,sidegear,x1gear,x1sidegear]
{
	@MODULE[ModuleWheelBase]
	{
		useNewFrictionModel = true
	}
	@MODULE[ModuleWheelSuspension]
	{
		useDistributedMass = true
	}
	@MODULE[ModuleWheelSteering]
	{
		autoSteeringAdjust = true
	}
}
